Description: Black-figure painted pottery fragment, incorporated into the neck-amphora 1888.2-8.71a, which shows a procession of women and a sphinx.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B107)
CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB. 582)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 102)
